title: Been trying to get in to a Nemesis Draft game for over an hour now...
body:
Dodge, dodge, dodge, dodge...

It's almost as if people want to play an organised game that follows LCS meta...

I can't fathom the logic of queuing up for Nemesis draft and then crying when the enemy picks you something that is weak.

I got picked Yorick, and to my dismay, I was forced to jungle, anyways I hop in, and amazingly, his clears were actually very good, the ghouls ended up tanking damage for me and I got free kills from the Kog mid, his W slow synergises well with the slow from Red buff, the E does respectable damage at all stages of the game, his Q synergises with W so you can drop tons of damage down with autos and keep applying that red buff, got incredibly fed and carried the game.

New meta for sure.
Lol I just cry when my teammates pick strong champions like Jinx or when they pick late game hypercarries with poorly defined weaknesses like Nasus, Veigar or Ryze.

needless to say, poppy went ultra legendary and was impossible to kill with our zil/taric/nami/aatrox/i cant recall the last one....

either way, raka/janna/braum/alistar all protecting a poppy....%%%%ing broken. not to mention ali works perfectly fine top. janna Q full charge can clear waves in mid perfectly fine and barely costs mana anyway, raka is a decent ADC and braum is just braum....
